actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on synthetic indigo powder, (3H-indol-3-one, 2-(1,3-dihydro- 3-oxo-2H-indol-2-ylidene)-1,2-dihydro-).

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on synthetic indigo powder, (3H-indol-3-one, 2-(1,3-dihydro- 3-oxo-2H-indol-2-ylidene)-1,2-dihydro-).

titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on synthetic indigo powder, (3H-indol-3-one, 2-(1,3-dihydro- 3-oxo-2H-indol-2-ylidene)-1,2-dihydro-).
